api/Funique.Manager.html.title: Namespace Funique.Manager | Funique Documentation
api/Funique.Manager.html.keywords: Namespace Funique.Manager Classes CinemaManager Managing the different cinema groups ------------------------------------------------ 管理不同劇場 CinemaManagerClientUtility CinemaManagerServerUtility ClientAndroidManagerUtility ClientStandAloneManagerUtility ClientTheaterManagerUtility ClientXRManagerUtility ManagerBase Base class for manager class, function and properties ------------------------------------------------ 管理基礎類別, 功能與屬性 ManagerBase<T> Base class for manager class, easy to manage worker ------------------------------------------------ 管理基礎類別, 簡單管理 MediaManager Manage the media files And control the bottom user interface of toolbar ------------------------------------------------ 管理多媒體檔案 控制底下工具列跟撥放器 MediaManagerClientUtility MediaManagerServerUtility Server side media handle utility base class Honestly... this component is not much about media More like handle network signal and translate signal to interact with compnent which it really handle the media player User must override below methods in order to make it works ------------------------------------------------ 伺服器方媒體控制元件父類別 老實講... 這元件其實跟媒體沒甚麼關係 更像是處裡網路訊號 和 翻譯網路信號 並且 與真的媒體元件互動 用戶必須繼承以下函式使這個元件有用 NetworkManager Defined the network behaviour for the application Default server port is 5000 Has basic sending and recevied methods, Watchdog functionality ------------------------------------------------ 定義網路應用程式行為 預設的 Port 為 5000 包含了基礎的傳輸以及接收, 看門狗功能 NetworkManagerClientUtility Network utility base class Mainly handle the LiteNetLib UDP connection with the master Behaviour will depends on the current client mode ------------------------------------------------ 網路元件基礎類 主要處理 LiteNetLib UDP 與 伺服器 連線 根據客戶端的模式定義網路行為 NetworkManagerServerUtility Network utility base class Handle multiple third-party library including OSC, LiteNetLib, NetCoreSocket The collection of solution for server side utility ------------------------------------------------ 網路元件基礎類 處理多種第三方程式庫 包括了 OSC, LiteNetLib, NetCoreSocket 多項網路方案的集合類別 PlayerManager Managing all clients instances ------------------------------------------------ 管理用戶實體 PlayerManagerUtility SettingManager Manage user preference setting interact with application, data store ------------------------------------------------ 管理用戶偏好設定 SettingManagerServerUtility StreamingManager Handle all things related to streaming services VOD and Live and Casting and None-Casting And handle the interaction between UI component and other manager Casting mode will transcoding the HLS streaming to master server local directroy Then user can get the streaming from nginx services The purposes of this is to save network usages None-Casting mode will send the URL to user, telling them to get video from online ------------------------------------------------ 處裡所有跟串流服務相關的事務 VOD 和 Live and 轉介 和 非轉介 還有處理與使用者介面 跟 其他元件的互動 轉介模式會將 HLS 串流存在 伺服器的本地資料夾 然後用戶再透過 Nginx 撈 目的是為了節省網路流量 非轉介模式會直接命令用戶播放 URL, 用戶會直接占用頻寬 StreamingManagerUtility UIManager Binding user interface events to presentation objects ------------------------------------------------ 幫助 UI 綁定事件 UIManagerUtility Network utility base ------------------------------------------------ 網路功能底層 VideoManager VideoManagerUtility Video manager handles video list and loading video list record files ------------------------------------------------ 影片管理員 處理 影片清單跟讀取紀錄

api/Funique.Manager.StreamingManager.htm.title: Class StreamingManager | Funique Documentation
api/Funique.Manager.StreamingManager.htm.keywords: Class StreamingManager Handle all things related to streaming services VOD and Live and Casting and None-Casting And handle the interaction between UI component and other manager Casting mode will transcoding the HLS streaming to master server local directroy Then user can get the streaming from nginx services The purposes of this is to save network usages None-Casting mode will send the URL to user, telling them to get video from online ------------------------------------------------ 處裡所有跟串流服務相關的事務 VOD 和 Live and 轉介 和 非轉介 還有處理與使用者介面 跟 其他元件的互動 轉介模式會將 HLS 串流存在 伺服器的本地資料夾 然後用戶再透過 Nginx 撈 目的是為了節省網路流量 非轉介模式會直接命令用戶播放 URL, 用戶會直接占用頻寬 Inheritance System.Object ManagerBase ManagerBase < StreamingManagerData > StreamingManagerUtility api/Funique.Streaming.html.title: Namespace Funique.Streaming | Funique Documentation
api/Funique.Streaming.html.keywords: Namespace Funique.Streaming Classes FFmpegWorker Use for generate cinema m3u8 streaming file purpose Use seperate process to do the work In order to make this worker works, ffmpeg.exe in streaming asset must exists ------------------------------------------------ 用來生成劇院的 m3u8 串流檔案 用子執行序進行作業 為了讓這個工作者做事, ffmpeg.exe 必須存在在 streaming asset 下 M3U8Handler M3U8 Streaming handler Use ffmpeg to generate streaming files ffmpeg workplace and nginx workplace are in different folder So when generate the file using streaming asset ffmpeg.exe The init.mp4 will stay in ffmpeg workplace, even tho we point the output in nginx folder We need to menually moving the file itself ------------------------------------------------ M3U8 串流管理者 使用 ffmpeg 生成串流檔案 ffmpeg 工作環境與 nginx 工作環境 在不同資料夾 所以當使用 streaming asset 資料夾中的 ffmpeg.exe 生成串流檔案時 init.mp4 會生在 ffmpeg 的工作環境, 即使我們在指令中指向 nginx 資料夾輸出 所以需要手動的移動檔案 NginxWorker A background thread for nginx application M3U8 Will trying the generate the file in nginx folder In order to let user access the streaming by URL The worker handle the process of nginx application run in the background ------------------------------------------------ Nginx 反向代理的執行序管理者 M3U8 會嘗試生成檔案至 nginx 的工作環境 為了能讓用戶透過 URL 存取串流 工作者會存取背景運作的 Nginx 執行序 StreamingController StreamingControllerBase Streaming panel controller Access all user interface properties to define the state ------------------------------------------------ 串流面板控制器 存取使用者介面屬性來決定目前設定數值 Structs StreamingManagerData Interfaces IFFmpegWorker IStreaming IStreamingManagerUtility

api/RenderHeads.Media.AVProVideo.Demos.h.title: Namespace RenderHeads.Media.AVProVideo.Demos | Funique Documentation
api/RenderHeads.Media.AVProVideo.Demos.h.keywords: Namespace RenderHeads.Media.AVProVideo.Demos Classes AutoRotate Rotates a transform, randomly changing direction and speed every few seconds ChangeAudioTrack Small demonstration showing how to script the changing of audio tracks ChangeStereoMode Small demonstration showing how to toggle stereo mode ChangeVideoExample A demo that shows how to use scripting to load videos DemoInfo This component just stores description text related to a specific demo scene The MediaPlayer in the scene can also be referenced to allow for scene change fade-from-black to only start once the video has loaded and has a valid frame FrameExtract A demo that shows how to extract a series of frames from the video, copy them into textures, and then save them to disk as images LoadFromBuffer Demonstration of how to load from a video from a byte array. NOTE: Only Windows using DirectShow API currently supports this feature. LoadFromBufferInChunks Demonstration of how to load from a video from a byte array. NOTE: Only Windows using DirectShow API currently supports this feature. Mapping3D Runs the demo for the scene that demonstrates how to map video playback to 3D models Spawns and removes cubes with video mapping NativeMediaOpen Demonstration of how to use StorageFiles with AVProVideo in UWP builds The code is put behind NETFX_CORE macros as it is only valid in UWP This example loads a video picked by the user after clicking the Pick Video File button, and directly from the CameraRoll with the right app capabilities set PlaybackSync Small demonstration of how you might synchronise multiple video playback Ideally the videos should be encoded with as many key-frames (I-frames) as possible SimpleController Simple video player GUI built using IMGUI Shows how a simpel video play can be created with scripting Includes support for fading to black when a new video is loaded SphereDemo A demo for playing back 360 video on a mesh, handles rotation of the main camera Supports rotation by VR device, gyroscope or mouse StartEndPoint Small demonstration of how you could script the playback of a section of video using a start and end point VideoTrigger Causes a video to play when the trigger collider is entered and rewind+pause when it is exited Audio is faded up and down too

articles/Guide/CreateBot.html.title: Create Bot profile | Funique Documentation
articles/Guide/CreateBot.html.keywords: Create Bot profile In order to use August, you must create one bot profile first. To generate your bot profile go to Discord_Developer The official discord document has detail tutorial, it guides your through the bot creating process. Tutorail_By_Discord After generate your bot profile Went back to your August application Let's open the app/bots/[YourBotName]/setting.json And enter the most important data first Name Bot name, will effect console output message Token Paste your bot token you just gather from discord After modified the setting.json, Let's start the framework again ! Nice ! Now we have a working bot right now, We can start adding modules to increase the features.

index.html.title: Funique Multimedia Framework | Funique Documentation
index.html.keywords: Funique Multimedia Framework What is FMF ? A list of tools that helps you quick build a funique project. The article will guide you install the plugin to inherit the base and extend the manager features. Why use FMF ? When i first time see the code structure and the way we maintain the codes, i be honest, it is pretty messy, colleague usually copy code file and ignore the dependencies issue or version issue, and often time, the code itself does not provide unit test, so often time, it stuck at environemnt testing stage. To solve this problem, it's pretty commom to thinks that we should sort out the code, and improve the maintainability. FMF will seperate all the codes in to plugins, and each plugins has its own unit testing, the result and view on each repo pages, the support version etc... The dependencies will solve by this way, each plugins has very clear dependencies requirement, so we won't confuse when we trying to pull the login in the projects. Another benifit is that, it's better have a docsmentation here to do things. so people won't ever get lost when login needs to be change. Quick start Installation
